internal.content:
---
title: Capacity Planning
---           

### Maximo Application Suite On-Premise Deployment Calculator:
- Use the Capacity Planning calculator to size your environment.
- Download the [sizing calculator](https://ibm.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?ContentId=6922bea5-57b9-448d-8e9f-c43af6fc9515#/doccenter/f6bc8873-d580-4ee8-a903-c4e0d3a7eee9/doc/%252Fddfc5fab90-c7f2-e86c-a2aa-9b0b6a9ee34d%252Fdd724d16cd-ef7a-d7ac-5016-a8349571be1b%252FdfOTRiYmU4NTQtNWY4NC03Y2QyLWZjYWUtOGIxYmFmZjkyZThk%252CPT0%253D%252CQXNzZXNzbWVudA%253D%253D%252Flfad068891-3f01-4101-b8cb-7f67405e0da8/grid/). Alternative link:  [sizing calculator](https://github.com/ibm-mas-manage/playbook/blob/master/Maximo%20Application%20Suite%20On%20Premise%20Deployment%20Calculator%20V7_7.xlsx).  
  - Update your configuration on the calculator tab.For example, select application(s), number of concurrent users.
  - Go to the "Detailed Report" tab to view the environment calculation details.

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: Capacity Planning
---           

### Maximo Application Suite On-Premise Deployment Calculator:
- Use the Capacity Planning calculator to size your environment.
- Download the [sizing calculator](https://ibm.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?ContentId=6922bea5-57b9-448d-8e9f-c43af6fc9515#/doccenter/f6bc8873-d580-4ee8-a903-c4e0d3a7eee9/doc/%252Fddfc5fab90-c7f2-e86c-a2aa-9b0b6a9ee34d%252Fdd724d16cd-ef7a-d7ac-5016-a8349571be1b%252FdfOTRiYmU4NTQtNWY4NC03Y2QyLWZjYWUtOGIxYmFmZjkyZThk%252CPT0%253D%252CQXNzZXNzbWVudA%253D%253D%252Flfad068891-3f01-4101-b8cb-7f67405e0da8/grid/). Alternative link:  [sizing calculator](https://github.com/ibm-mas-manage/playbook/blob/master/Maximo%20Application%20Suite%20On%20Premise%20Deployment%20Calculator%20V7_7.xlsx).  
  - Update your configuration on the calculator tab.For example, select application(s), number of concurrent users.
  - Go to the "Detailed Report" tab to view the environment calculation details.
